meanings.definition: Impudent or disrespectful in speech or behavior.
meanings.sent1: She got in trouble for making lippy remarks to the teacher.

meanings.sent3: Even though it was meant as a joke, his lippy comment offended his friend.
meanings.sent4: Her lippy attitude was like a sharp thorn in the peaceful garden of the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The image of her lippy behavior stuck in everyone's minds.
